meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
Directing the Clerk of the House to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2157.

main.name: HCONRES45
main.longTitle: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION Directing the Clerk of the House to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2157.
main.enactingFormula: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring),

section.content: That in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 2157, the Clerk of the House of Representatives shall make the following correction: In section 1207, strike “May 31, 2019” each place such term appears and insert “June 14, 2019”.

signature.role: Clerk of the House of Representatives.
